# Metrics

MiMo reports a range of metrics including

1. Mean Length of Utterance in Words
2. Mean Length of Utterance in Morphemes (provided MiMo is able to morphologically segement your language)
3. Type Token Ratio
4. VocD (HDD) (A measure of lexical diversity)

These may be accessed under the `ðŸŒˆ Let's explore` tab.

Further information on these metrics is provided in the [Morphological analysis](morphological_analysis.qmd), [Other syntactic metrics](other_syntactic_metrics.qmd) and [Lexical analysis](lexical_analysis.qmd) sections.
